mapper.select: SELECT M.*, S.s_storename, S.s_storedesc, S.s_crn, S.s_deliveryfee, S.s_latefee, SF.sf_sysname FROM M LEFT JOIN S ON M.m_id = S.s_id LEFT JOIN SF ON S.s_id = SF.sf_s_id WHERE M.m_id = #{s_id}

SELECT o_c_id, c_name, SUM(CASE WHEN order_sort = '구매' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS SELL_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN order_sort = '대여' THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS RENTAL_AMOUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN r_latefee_total > 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS LATE_AMOUNT FROM order_list INNER JOIN customer ON order_list.o_c_id = customer.c_id where s_id = 'seller001' GROUP BY o_c_id, c_name
